artist: Robert Gibbings; Text by Sir Thomas Malory; A. W. Pollard; The Limited Editions Club; Moira and  Robert Gibbings
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: half blue linen, pattern paper sides in blue and white, gold-stamped lettering; endpapers: cream-white wove; slip case: blue-green paper over cardboard, printed label affixed (slightly damaged); type: Monotype perpetua; 784 pp.
title: Le Morte D'Arthur
